contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1903 D Abertillery Contest
Abertillery Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
abertillery
Gems of Welsh Melody
Abertillery, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK
Prizes - 1st £14, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest - 1st(£1.1s) Cory. Best cornet - Ferndale. Best trombone - Tillery Colliery. 4 bands competed.
June 17, 2013, 9:56 a.m. July 26, 2016, 10:32 a.m.
1 Tillery Collieries Band John Griffiths
2 Ferndale Samuel Radcliffe
3 Cory Band John Bailey
4 Abertillery Silver William Rimmer
